author: wein
msg: Add optional parameter action to constructor of ChangedPath to reflect
the action that took place with path. Set this parameter to an
appropriate value in all calls within repos.py.
For compatibility reasons the existing parameters were not changed.
Add optional parameter action to define the action that took place
Set new parameter action to an appropriate value.

author: wein
msg: Set property svn:eol-style to native for tools/hook-scripts/mailer/tests/mailer-t1.output to avoid problems with line ending styles.

author: malcolm
msg: jerenkrantz is planning to add support for in-tree compilation for zlib,
making the decision to ship the zlib source in the Unix tarball a lot
Revert r21462: include the zlib source in Unix tarballs again.

author: pburba
msg: Consolidate redundant checkout error testing code in checkout_tests.py.

author: malcolm
msg: Don't include zlib in the deps tarball (though keep it in the zipfile).
The Unix build is only able to use a preinstalled copy of zlib, so
shipping the zlib source only suffices to confuse.  (Also, it's highly
likely that a user on a Unix platform already has a version of zlib
installed, in which case the source is unnecessary).
Require and package zlib only when building a zip distribution.
